Others: Mohammad Haris has been named as a replacement for Fakhar Zaman in the Pakistan squad for the remainder of the T20 World Cup due to his PCL injury.
Fakhar Zaman sustained his injury during the game against the Netherlands on Sunday.
The replacement of a player requires the approval of the Event Technical Committee before the replacement player can be officially added to the squad.
Pakistan still have a chance to qualify for the semi-finals, but they must win their remaining games against South Africa and Bangladesh and rely on other results going their way.
